name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook mitigates against a technique where an adversary has used a scripting interpreter for unauthorized script execution, network enumeration, and data exfiltration.

parallel--5f35e87c-0adf-4c2c-b8d4-b404fc.name: Initial Mitigations
parallel--5f35e87c-0adf-4c2c-b8d4-b404fc.description: Execute initial mitigation steps in parallel

action--a9e539a4-88b0-4ecf-bf9f-6ffab67b.description: Terminate all running malicious PowerShell processes.

action--3127acee-575c-4dcb-8c43-8722c82e.name: Restrict PowerShell Execution Policy
action--3127acee-575c-4dcb-8c43-8722c82e.description: Set PowerShell execution policy to restricted to prevent unauthorized script execution.

action--210a4bd7-1ddd-4fab-912b-b09c6b1a.description: Reset the password for the compromised user account.

action--9ce3677a-a5a9-41c7-9aeb-0ffab9a9.description: Block suspicious outbound traffic over a non-standard protocol.

while-condition--f7632ea9-8e4b-4af8-9b22.description: Iteratively run a full antivirus scan until system is clean.

action--1edf9d54-b379-44e5-af9e-91c8b465.description: Execute a full antivirus scan on the system.
